welcome_message_body: "Welcome to scenic Middle Island, known for its charming small-town atmosphere and beautiful natural landscapes. We invite you to explore our city and discover all the hidden gems it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Haven Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and lounges.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
